de.esoco.process

Class ProcessAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.process.ProcessAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProcessListener

    public abstract class ProcessAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProcessListener
    An abstract implementation of ProcessListener that contains empty implementations of all listener methods. Subclasses need only to implement the methods for the events they are interested in. This class also provides the additional method processEnded(Process) which will be invoked by any of the methods that are invoked if the process ends, whether successful or not.

      void processEnded(Process rProcess)
      This method will be invoked from the default implementations of the processCanceled(Process), processFailed(Process), and processFinished(Process) methods.
      void processFailed(Process rProcess)
      Will be notified when the process execution failed.
      void processFinished(Process rProcess)
      Will be notified when the process execution has finished.
      void processResumed(Process rProcess)
      Will be notified when the process execution is resumed after a previous suspension.
      void processStarted(Process rProcess)
      Will be notified when the process execution has started.
      void processSuspended(Process rProcess)
      Will be notified when the process execution has been suspended temporarily.

      • processEnded

        public void processEnded(Process rProcess)
        This method will be invoked from the default implementations of the processCanceled(Process), processFailed(Process), and processFinished(Process) methods. It is recommended that subclasses override either these methods or only this method.
        Parameters:
        rProcess - The process

      • processFailed

        public void processFailed(Process rProcess)
        Description copied from interface: ProcessListener
        Will be notified when the process execution failed. If the failure was caused by an exception it can be queried from the process parameter ProcessRelationTypes.PROCESS_EXCEPTION. This method will also be invoked if another listener method caused the process failure by throwing a runtime exception.
        Specified by:
        processFailed in interface ProcessListener
        Parameters:
        rProcess - The process
        See Also:
        ProcessListener.processFailed(Process)

      • processFinished

        public void processFinished(Process rProcess)
        Description copied from interface: ProcessListener
        Will be notified when the process execution has finished. If the method wants to prevent the process from committing it's transaction it should throw a runtime exception.
        Specified by:
        processFinished in interface ProcessListener
        Parameters:
        rProcess - The process
        See Also:
        ProcessListener.processFinished(Process)
